sentences.english: - What kind of teddy bear is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on pieni, pehmeä, söpö ja vaaleanpunainen. Se on ihana!
sentences.english: - It is small, soft, cute and light pink. It is lovely!
- What kind of diamond is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on valoisa, iso, kova, kallis ja valkoinen. Se on ihana!
sentences.english: - It is bright, big, hard, expensive and white. It is lovely!
- What kind of pen is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on lyhyt, vanha, huonokuntoinen, rikkinäinen ja punainen.
sentences.english: - It is short, old, in poor condition, broken and red.
- What kind of mountain is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on korkea, kylmä, suuri, ruskea ja valkoinen. Se on ihana!
sentences.english: - It is tall, cold, large, brown and white. It is lovely!
- What kind of dachshund is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on puhdas, leveä mutta lyhyt, ruskea ja kaunis.
sentences.english: - It is clean, wide but short, brown and beautiful.
- What kind of sun is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on pyöreä, valoisa, kuuma, kaunis, erittäin iso ja keltainen.
sentences.english: - It is round, bright, hot, beautiful, very big and yellow.
- What kind of tunnel is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on pimeä, pitkä ja hyväkuntoinen.
sentences.english: - It is dark, long and in good condition.
- What kind of bed is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on pehmeä, uusi, kallis, leveä, iso ja sininen.
sentences.english: - It is soft, new, expensive, wide, big and blue.
- What kind of train is it?

sentences.finnish: - Se on tumman vihreä ja pitkä.
sentences.english: - It is dark green and long.
